legal_basis: subsection 113(a) of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
subsection 72(1) of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
evidence_assessment: new evidence of his Pentecostal faith
credibility_findings: failed to contradict previous credibility findings
decision_reasoning: officer considered this evidence but concluded it did not overcome prior Board decisions
risk_of_persecution: Applicant's fear of persecution upon return to Eritrea due to religious beliefs and perceived anti-government opinion
result_of_case: Application for judicial review dismissed; no risk of persecution established
application_details: Judicial review of PRRA officer's decision
